recommendations: CRITICAL: Replace all mock cryptographic implementations with real libraries (pqcrypto-falcon, ring, rustls)
CRITICAL: Remove all default_for_testing() methods from production code paths
HIGH: Replace unwrap() calls with proper error handling using Result<T, E> and ?
CRITICAL: Complete all TODO/FIXME security implementations before production
HIGH: Add input validation for all external data sources
Add rate limiting to all public endpoints
Add audit logging for security events
Configure TLS 1.3 with strong cipher suites
Implement certificate pinning for critical connections
Perform regular dependency updates and security scanning
